thread.title: Chance the Rapper didn't buy that Eric Andre was dating Rosario Dawson
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper didn't buy that Eric Andre was dating Rosario Dawson

author: Tyler Schmall
title: Chance the Rapper didn't buy that Eric Andre was dating Rosario Dawson
text:
Ah, Valentine's Day: That wonderful, totally real holiday that we all love and respect, because of how real it is.
It's a day of love. But also? It's a day of learning.
Eric Andre, of Adult Swim's The Eric Andre Show , spent a lot of today posting pictures of himself and actress Rosario Dawson on the world wide web.
#valentine #rosario â¤ï¸ğŸ’•â¤ï¸ğŸ’•â¤ï¸ pic.twitter.com/1k9JcdGjzd
â€” Eric Andre (@ericandre) February 14, 2017
But Chance the Rapper, who recently took home like a sh*t load of Grammys , wasn't buying it apparently.
SEE ALSO: Chance the Rapper drops #ThankUObama merch line for a nation grieving
The undisputed most gorgeous being on the planet ğŸ˜ğŸ’•ğŸ’‹ğŸŒ¹â¤ï¸ğŸ”¥ @rosariodawson I love u bbğŸ™ğŸ¾ #HappyValentinesDay pic.twitter.com/Bk7MyIsGV5
â€” Eric Andre (@ericandre) February 14, 2017
So Eric Andre took a break from promoting his new (and exceptionally good) series Eric Andre Interviews the Hot Babes of Instagram , to clear everything up for him.
One more for @chancetherapper #proof ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜ #notaprank @rosariodawson pic.twitter.com/Udcbhtbezu
â€” Eric Andre (@ericandre) February 14, 2017
He tweeted this because I text Rosario asking if it was a joke ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ https://t.co/UQ2sQZeAPs
â€” Lil Chano From 79th (@chancetherapper) February 14, 2017
So there you go. To anyone, who for some reason didn't believe it: It's for real. Eric Andre and Rosario Dawson are a definite thing.
